title: Beryozovka, Ufimsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
text:
Beryozovka () is a <a href="types%20of%20inhabited%20localities%20in%20Russia">rural locality</a> (a <a href="Village%23Russia">village</a>) in Zubovsky Selsoviet, <a href="Ufimsky%20District">Ufimsky District</a>, <a href="Bashkortostan">Bashkortostan</a>, Russia. The population was 115 as of 2010. There is 1 street.
Geography.
Beryozovka is located 22 km southwest of <a href="Ufa">Ufa</a> (the district's administrative centre) by road. Nizhegorodka is the nearest rural locality.
